welcome_message_body: "Welcome to New Brunswick, where the charm of our small town meets the beauty of the surrounding nature. Known for its quaint shops, historic landmarks, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes check-in counters, security checkpoints, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities and personalized services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those flying in on private jets, the private terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport provides exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
